entry.tran: 小（应用）程序；（网页上的）小程序
entry.def: An applet is a computer program which is contained within a page on the World Wide Web, and which transfers itself to your computer and runs automatically while you are looking at that Web page.

means.word_mean: 1. a Java application; an application program that uses the client's web browser to provide a user interface
